column5: Oh these next few days are looking great! warm temps, on friday then sudden drop on sat, maybe ill get out on thurs, hey Snag aka pike wizard, lol, how do u think the action will be in these next few days? r u gonna make it out? i cant wait to get out there and try my new baitcaster out!

Thanks for the invite brother but I am never certain what days I can escape the salt mines.  I think you'll be very successful though I'm sending good vibes your way.  I think Friday is the day. Overcast, low winds and 10 degrees!  If I fish on Friday and catch anything, I will go topless.  I challenge you to a topless report.  Good luck!!!!!!  p.s. practice like nuts on the new baitcaster, if you haven't already
thnx for ur good vibes, im feeling it already lol, hmm topless, lol, i dont know , hahah, maybe if a get a fish, lol.

I'm thinking to head down to Toronto downtown for some fishing with my dad and/or my bro. Still thinking i we should just head to Ward's Island or just hangout right at the waterfront and fish beside those docks Now all depends on if they are free or not
iam gonna head out this weekend  snag   maybe ill get that nasty one that ripped me off
